message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't go above $10,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm aiming for a bit more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable going above $10,000 for this product. Would you be able to lower the price further?
